description: Defines the PollControlClusterEvent class which extends ClusterCommandEvent, representing a specific event related to the Poll Control Cluster in a Zigbee mock SDK.

classes.name: PollControlClusterEvent
classes.description: An event class representing Poll Control Cluster events, specifically used for checking in during polling cycles.

methods.name: PollControlClusterEvent
methods.description: Constructor that initializes the event with cluster parameters such as EUI64, endpoint ID, cluster ID, server flag, and command ID.
